description: Roughly 1/3rd of Basecamp's 57 employees have decided to accept Basecamp's severance package and resigned because of the company's recent policy changes– the most notable restricting political and societal discussions in the workplace. Several employees posted tweets stating that they left Basecamp due to these changes.
author: hyatt d.
